description: Flagship housing scheme providing pucca houses with basic amenities to rural households who are homeless or living in kutcha/dilapidated houses. Phase-II approved for 2024-25 to 2028-29 for 2 crore additional houses.
target_beneficiaries: Rural households living in kutcha/dilapidated houses

eligibility.income_limit: Automatic exclusion for households with any member earning more than ₹15,000 per month or paying Income Tax
other_conditions: Exclusion criteria: Motorized three/four wheeler, mechanized agriculture equipment, Kisan Credit Card with limit ≥ ₹50,000, any Government employee in household, non-agricultural enterprises registered with Government, paying Income Tax/Professional Tax, owning 2.5+ acres irrigated land or 5+ acres unirrigated land
Prioritization: Houseless first, followed by those with inadequate housing

required_documents: Aadhaar cards of all family members
benefits: Financial assistance: ₹1.20 lakh in plain areas
Financial assistance: ₹1.30 lakh in North Eastern Region and Hill States (Himachal Pradesh, Uttarakhand, J&K, Ladakh)
Convergence: ₹12,000 for toilet from Swachh Bharat Mission
95 days of unskilled wage under MGNREGA
Direct Benefit Transfer in three installments

application_process.mode: Offline through Gram Panchayat/Block Development Office
steps: SECC 2011 data verified at Gram Sabha
Eligible households identified based on exclusion criteria
Beneficiary submits documents to Gram Panchayat
First installment credited to bank account
